sentence.Network_en: Actual memories mostly are traces not of past sensations but of past conceptualization or verbalization.
sentence.Network_cn: 现实的记忆多半不是过去的感觉的痕迹,而是过去的概念化或言语化过程的痕迹.

entry.tran: 用言语表达;用文字描述
entry.def: If you verbalize your feelings, thoughts, or ideas, you express them in words.

example.tran: 他无法用言语表达自己的感情
